channel.title: INartsAndEnt
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2 Idris Elba Survival Movies Ascend Netflix's Global Top 10 Chart
item.description: Two survival movies starring Idris Elba, one from 2017 and the other from 2022, have ascended Netflix's Global Top 10 chart in ninth and tenth place.

item.title: Robert Eggers Explains Why Horror Deserves More Respect in Cinema
item.description: Robert Eggers discusses why horror remains undervalued, emphasizing the genre’s power to explore humanity’s darkest corners through storytelling.

item.title: 10 Best Thriller Books Of 2024
item.description: Many new thriller books hit shelves in 2024, but the best of them delivered on the suspense and twists while also showcasing other strengths.
